June 25, 2017 D Regionalmusiktag - BMVTGOG, SO (Marschmusik)
Regionalmusiktag - BMVTGOG, SO (Marschmusik) 0 March Contest
regionalmusiktag-bmvtgog-so-marschmusik
Oensingen, SO, Switzerland > held on June 24th & 25th
25 Bands competed (mixed Brass/Wind, sep. Saturday & Sunday; Draws till 15 played on Sat).
[Entertaining Music / Own Choices: Expertise by Manuel Epli, Alfred Fischer & Markus Steimen]
May 22, 2016, 6:42 p.m. June 26, 2017, 12:25 p.m.
1 Musikgesellschaft Konkordia Aedermannsdorf Bernhard Wüthrich March: Brass Parade
1 MG Konkordia Mümliswil Marco Nussbaumer March: Vivat Lucerna
3 Brass Band Kappel Oliver Waldmann March: Langnauer Marsch
6 Brass Band Matzendorf Marcel Bossert March: Vivat Lucerna
7 MV Gretzenbach Andrea Scherrer March: For Ever
9 MV Herbetswil Dirk Amrein March: Ravanello
11 Brass Band Frohsinn Laupersdorf Wolfgang Nussbaumer
Unknown Result Brass Band Wolfwil Emerita Blum-Duss
